skills.Name: Body To Mind
skills.Description: Sacrifices your own HP to regenerate MP by 8%.

skills.Name: Superior Summon Mastery
skills.Description: A Servitor can be summoned when summon points are 4 or lower. INT +2; When the 4 Mark Skills are used, the Servitor is linked with the ability of wrath.

skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting
skills.Description: Increases Casting Spd. by 5%.

skills.Name: Dark Stance
skills.Description: Increases Magical Skill Power by 5% and Dark defense by 10, and applies Dark to attribute magic.

skills.Name: Death Spike
skills.Description: Throws a bone to inflict dark damage on the enemy with 22 Power added to M. Atk.

skills.Name: Mark of Trick
skills.Description: For 20 seconds, inflict damage with 8 Power added to M. Atk. Additionally, interrupt target's skill casting.

skills.Name: Transfer Pain
skills.Description: Transfers 60% of the damage received to your first summoned servitor for 10 seconds.

skills.Name: Blood Sacrifice
skills.Description: Sacrifice a portion of your pets life to heal yourself for 20% health.

skills.Name: Summon Reanimated Man
skills.Description: Summons a Reanimated Man. Requires a fresh corpse and 1 summon point.

skills.Name: Summon Corrupted Man
skills.Description: Summons a Corrupted Man. Requires a fresh corpse and 2 summon points.

skills.Name: Anchor
skills.Description: Causes the enemy's body to go completely rigid for 5 seconds and causes paralysis for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Fast HP Recovery
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Fast Mana Recovery
skills.Description: Increases MP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Concentration
skills.Description: Decreases magic cancel rate by 18.

skills.Name: Death Spike
skills.Description: Throws a bone to inflict dark damage on the enemy with 22 Power added to M. Atk.

skills.Name: Mark of Trick
skills.Description: For 20 seconds, inflict damage with 8 Power added to M. Atk. Additionally, interrupt target's skill casting.

skills.Name: Mark of Weakness
skills.Description: Curse the target with an unbearable weakness, draining their power. Deals 12 Magic Damage per second and reducing M. Atk/ P. Skill Damage by 15%% for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Summon Team Mate
skills.Description: Summons the selected party member to your location. Requires 1 Summoning Crystal.

skills.Name: Corpse Drain
skills.Description: Utilize your dead horde by absorbing their energy for 20% mana.

skills.Name: Void Destruction
skills.Description: Inflict your targets mind with the void causing them to trepidation and dread. Deals 24 Dark Magic Damage and 12 damage per second for 10 seconds. Reduces M. Def by 25% and can over-hit.
